introduction: The film's director, Paul Vekkiali. Paris, the 30-ies. Chantal works as a model in the fashion house. She is beautiful, desirable. In the rich man she falls in love with Lord Whitney. But hardly makes their first child, a woman learns that her struck with leprosy. The only salvation, which opens in front of her - an escape to the islands of Fiji, where the famous leper colony Makogay.This place is sick and suffering, where the priests and the doctors do their hard duty. In an environment of people affected, Chantal will find its place and realize that good prevails not only there, where everything pleases the eye. She was saved.Becoming even more beautiful than before, she realizes that he no longer able to return to it until now so familiar Parisian world and decided to devote the rest of his life to serving in the Makogae.
